TopicTitle: KSP on sale on Steam until monday!

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! From now until Monday at 10am Pacific Time, KSP is 40% off on Steam! If you have been unsure whether or not to buy the game at full price, then this is the chance to buy it at a severely reduced price.

Go to Steam to purchase your copy today!
Awesome to hear! I bet people who've been eyeing it for a while may just grab a copy and toss away .18.3!
Already have it, so I bought it for a friend
Already a proud and happy owner. Been blasting the link via STEAM friends. Have you posted on the Official KSP STEAM group as well?
